oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alberta Survey, 2016A
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Population Research Laboratory (Department of Sociology, University of Alberta)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Population Research Laboratory (PRL) administered the 2016 Alberta Survey A. This survey of households across the province of Alberta continues to enable academic researchers, government departments, and non-profit organizations to explore a wide range of topics in a structured research framework and environment. Sponsorsâ€™ research questions are asked together with demographic questions in a telephone interview of Alberta households. (2016-08-31)
